the world economic forum predicts automation will displace 75 million jobs by 2025 but create 133 million new ones.
heavy social media use is linked to increased anxiety and depression, especially due to social comparison.
ai can improve healthcare, but concerns about data privacy persist.
ai systems can reflect biases, leading to inequality, especially in hiring.
the un stresses the need for global standards on privacy, cybersecurity, and ai ethics.
